content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The target structure consists of 5 building blocks arranged in 2 layers:

**First (Bottom) Layer:**
- A blue cube on the left
- A red cube with an arch or cutout on one side in the middle
- A green cube on the right

**Second (Top) Layer:**
- A yellow rectangular block placed horizontally across the blue cube and partially over the green cube
- An orange triangular prism (wedge) placed on top of the yellow rectangular block

**Spatial Relationships:**
- The blue, red, and green cubes form the base layer, positioned side by side
- The yellow rectangular block spans across the blue cube and partially over the green cube
- The orange triangular prism sits on top of the yellow rectangular block, positioned toward the left side

## Selected Blocks from the Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:
- Blue cube (index 6)
- Red cube with arch cutout (index 1)
- Green cube (index 7)
- Yellow rectangular block in horizontal orientation (index 9)
- Orange triangular prism/wedge (index 14)

## Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6
    Step2: Move block with index 1
    Step3: Move block with index 7
    Step4: Move block with index 9
    Step5: Move block with index 14
}
```

This assembly sequence builds from the bottom layer up, starting with the base cubes, then adding the horizontal yellow block, and finally placing the orange triangular wedge on top.
